Tests dump-as-markup for input and textarea forms.
| <!DOCTYPE html>
| <html>
|   <head>
|     <script>
|       src="../../resources/dump-as-markup.js"
|     "

"
|   <body>
|     <input>
|       value="original"
|       this.value="replaced"
|       <shadow:root>
|         <div>
|           id="text-field-container"
|           pseudo="-webkit-textfield-decoration-container"
|           shadow:pseudoId="-webkit-textfield-decoration-container"
|           <div>
|             id="editing-view-port"
|             <div>
|               "replaced"
|     "
"
|     <textarea>
|       this.value="replaced"
|       "original"
|       <shadow:root>
|         <div>
|           "replaced"
|     "
"
|     <script>
|       "
Markup.description("Tests dump-as-markup for input and textarea forms.");

document.getElementsByTagName("input")[0].value = "replaced";
document.getElementsByTagName("textarea")[0].value = "replaced";
"
|     "
"
